reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in this hotel for 4 nights, the feeling was that it was a big mistake, but after further research among local hotels we found that it is probably the best version of the Bled's hotels. Rooms are extremely outdated with old furniture, the whole hotel needs a face lift.
reviews.title: Don't keep your expectations high
Good location
reviews.text: Bled itself is amazingly gorgeous place.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Warnings for travelers:
reviews.title: great location!

reviews.text: Do not stay in this hotel Friday and Saturday night in Spring/Summer/Fall. If you have to, come in the middle of the week: it was hot and we had our balcony door cracked open to let Bled's amazing clean air in and we didn't get a minute of sleep: for 2 nights there were parties downstairs(our room was on the 3d floor) - loud latter, screams, songs, music. I called reception desk as 3:30 in the morning and the answer was that everybody is calling them, but they can't do anything.
reviews.title: Great location, good choice for a hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Also if you are not a smoker- do not open you balcony door: apparently hotel doesn't designate nonsmoking rooms and all our attempts to get fresh air in the room ended up with pumping smoke from the balconies next to ours.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel right on the Lake.

reviews.text: I stayed there for two nights during Sept-October. The room is not renovated meaning for example cabinet/drawers doors lacks its original decoration and stuff like that. But ... since I really do not care if room has modern furniture I liked staying there because: rooms were much cleaner and more practical then in some modern hotels I have been, also I liked bathroom a lot, and breakfast was great too, also room had nice view to the lake. All in all, good hotel to stay compared to price you pay. PS: a lot of group tours with seniors stay in this hotel so if you prefer a bit more younger company maybe this hotel is not for you.
reviews.title: Hotel needs renovation but still I liked stay there

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here in August 2013 for two nights as part of a Tour Group. Some of us had upgraded rooms with and air conditioning and some of us had rooms that had not been renovated.
reviews.title: Pros and Cons but great location.

reviews.text: Pros:
reviews.title: Just average

reviews.text: The hotel itself is older, however, we did find it to be clean and the public areas large.
reviews.title: Convenient hotel with nice lake view, but quite basic equipment and room

reviews.text: The Breakfast buffet was good. We also ate in the inside Dining room one night and also the outdoor Restaurant belonged to the hotel once for lunch – both had good food. Of course, they have excellent Creme Cake – a speciality to the area.
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very and friendly service, helpful staff. Great location. The best cream slice in Bled. There are two negatives: the lighting in the room is poor, and on the park side of the hotel the room tends to be quite dark; and our room did not have a bath. But as long as you are aware of this my recommendation is definitely go for it!
reviews.title: Excellent service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We made a booking (through agency) for one night but arrived a day earlier because of bad weatherforecast in the Triglav-national parc. Once we arrived at the reception and explained we would like to book an extra night, the receptionist checks our reservation for the day after and tells us that our booking was cancelled (reason unknown). We asks some explaination because we already paid and did certainly not made any cancellation at all. He just adviced to come back tomorrow.
reviews.title: Bad reception

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Anyway, we asked for an available room and he just tells that an 3* star hotel would possible be a better option (!) - quiet an unpolite and arrogant attitude !! I asks for the roomrate and we took it but didn't feel welcome at all - a big minus. The morning after - I went to reception desk again where his collegue was already brought up-to-speed about our cancellation and immediatly shown me email which they received 2 weeks ago for another agency. Further explanation couldn't be given to us. When we got home, I took further contact and found out that the initial bookingagency went broke....(clever-hotels.com)
reviews.title: Very good hotel with a view

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nevertheless, breakfest is oké and would not disappoint you. Room are clean and you have your own balcony. It's a spacious hotel. Good location!
reviews.title: A bit dated but great location and pool

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I spent 7 days at this hotel late in August 2013. The front office promised me a room with a lake view and they honoured their promise. The view of the lake from our balcony was fantastic. The area surrounding the hotel (Lake Bled) is a super tranquil place. The service is very good. Food is excellent. I recommend Park Hotel for couples, families and families with children. A message of thanks goes to all the staff for a nice stay.
reviews.title: Great location with a view

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had paid extra for a lake view and it was so worth it! Rooms are fairly ordinary but fine. Sitting on the balcony looking over at the castle was magic enhanced by the easy availability of very good wine. The public rooms are awful communist era bleak with terrible lighting which made the balcony essential. We didn't care about the noise from below although it was very loud when the bikers were in town. Lake Bled is so pretty it seems unreal.
reviews.title: Worth it for the view!

reviews.text: We were half board and breakfast was fine although one morning pasta replaced the advertised porridge which really surprised some people. Fairly awful machine coffee but add an extra shot of espresso and it's almost drinkable. Staff in the hotel including those in the dining room are very pleasant and helpful. The dining room is huge so try not to lose your partner as I did one morning.
reviews.title: Apline Lake Property Needs Updating

reviews.text: Dinner on the whole was fine except for one dreadful evening when several tours came in at once and we literally could not get anything we wanted to eat. We should have left the chaos and gone elsewhere as eating out is very reasonable. We had a gloomy table in the unpleasant and cavernous room but we just scuttled out as soon as we were finished. House wine is good and the lady who sorted the drinks was incredibly organised even when under awful pressure and always managed to smile. Food is self service. The night after the disaster we just peeped in before going out to eat and were greeted with sparkling wine and a special menu so of course we stayed!
reviews.title: Location ...Location...Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: So the best things about this hotel are the smiling and efficient staff and the amazing view and I mustn't forget the very nice swimming pool which we enjoyed. Slovenia is absolutely gorgeous and Lake Bled is like a film set. And don't forget to try the cake.
reviews.title: ITS ALL ABOUT THE VIEW

reviews.text: Near one of the most gorgeous spots in Europe this property needs some refreshing. Rooms are OK but new carpeting and paint would help. Same goes for the lobby. Restaurant and food are average at best. Some very strange hours for the rooftop lounge. Staff was just OK except at the lobby bar which was much friendlier.
reviews.title: Not a good choice
